flawed_nl_solution:
The farmer has 125 cows because 50 / 0.4 = <<50/0.4=125>>125
The farmer has 57 female cows because 125 x 0.6 = <<125*0.6=57>>57
The farmer will get 114 gallons of milk a day because 57 x 2 = <<57*2=114>>114
#### 114

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
